duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordination and supervision of quality performance of equipment mechanics and service personnel.
Scheduling repairs for customer and company owned rental equipment.
Maintain and nurture existing customer relationships to ensure 100% customer satisfaction.
Promptly respond to and resolve customer inquiries, requests, complaints, or other communications.
Employee training and development and maintaining a safe work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
